snippet: In Laura Lippman’s new novel, a woman running a suburban prostitution ring learns that the father of her son, a violent pimp, may soon be released from prison.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book And When She Was Good by Laura Lippman.
lead_paragraph: In Laura Lippman’s new novel, a woman running a suburban prostitution ring learns that the father of her son, a violent pimp, may soon be released from prison.

headline.seo: ‘And When She Was Good’ by Laura Lippman
headline.main: A Secret Life Reinvented Once Again
headline.print_headline: A Secret Life Reinvented Once Again
